title: Grandma Smiley's Magical Playmates
description: A children's story about Grandma Smiley and her four grandchildren. When the children come to grandma for their weekly visits, Grandma Smiley wants to make them friends and playmates with her special magic. Fun and laughter are enjoyed by all as they make their playmates and the love between the generations continues to grow.
author: C.G. Adler
